name: Same Lap Different Trap
description:
Game made for Nordic Game Jam 2019.
Compete against your friends.

Local multiplayer:
2 - 4 Players. (Only Controller supported)

Credits:
Jacob Keller Høllund - Programming.
Oliver D.J. Christensen - 3D Backgrounds.
Leyli Bunyadzade - 2D Characters.
Rune Sønder - Programming.
Nicklas Johansen Lið - Programming.

Sound:
- Ultimate Game Music Collection (2 tracks)
